Each course was a delight, bursting with flavor and artistry. Notable highlights included the seared scallops‚Äîcooked to perfection.
The service was impeccable; the staff were knowledgeable and attentive, special recognition to Ms. WINNIE LIEW who is always ensuring that every detail of our dining experience was flawless.

Overall, Ocean Restaurant offers not just a meal, but a memorable experience that combines exquisite cuisine with breathtaking views of marine life.
